name: dante
title: Dante
desc: A uncluttered minimal Astro.js + Tailwind CSS theme designed for those who appreciate clarity and minimalism.
article:
Danteâs straightforward design prioritizes essential elements and readability, resulting in a lightweight and efficient website.


This theme supports a markdown/MDX-powered blog, RSS feed, subscription form, tags, and tag pages, is SEO-friendly, and has dark and light color modes, etc.

Theme Features

  • Dark and light color mode
  • Hero section with bio
  • Portfolio collection
  • Pagination support
  • Post tags support
  • Subscription form
  • View transitions
  • Tailwind CSS
  • Mobile-first responsive layout
  • SEO-friendly with canonical URLs and OpenGraph data
  • Sitemap support
  • RSS Feed support
  • Markdown & MDX support

For more Astro.js themes please check JustGoodUI.com.

github.name: dante-astro-theme
github.description: Dante, a single-author blog and portfolio theme for Astro.js.
